name: io.github.XeroAPI/xero-mcp-server
description: This is a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server implementation for Xero. It provides a bridge between the MCP protocol and Xero's API, allowing for standardized access to Xero's accounting and business features.

environment_variables.name: XERO_CLIENT_ID
environment_variables.description: Client ID for Xero OAuth2 authentication

environment_variables.name: XERO_CLIENT_SECRET
environment_variables.description: Client secret for Xero OAuth2 authentication

environment_variables.name: XERO_CLIENT_BEARER_TOKEN
environment_variables.description: Bearer token for authentication, takes precedence over client ID/secret
